description:
Ahhh Enrico! Another natural guy! He's a mix of Hispanic and Irish, but obviously favors Latin heat.
Enrico was interesting to work with. He was real quiet when we started doing photos, but then as his clothes came off, he started talking and opening up. By the time we were finished with photos he was keyed up and ready to shoot his video.
We sat down to do the video, and it was like we re-set to the beginning. He got super quiet again. It took a bit of filming to draw him out again.
He was pretty intent on the straight porn playing, and the boy was nuts of the lube!
Anyway, hope you enjoy this hot dude!
title: Enrico - Solo
